digits.description: Format to a fixed number of digits after the decimal point, set to 0 means format to integer. Will use formatter as display value when configured
digits.description_zh: Format to a fixed number of digits after the decimal point, set to 0 means format to integer. Will use formatter as display value when configured

parser.description: Parse input text into number which should work with formatter
parser.description_zh: Parse input text into number which should work with formatter

step.description: The value to increase or decrease each time, can be a decimal
step.description_zh: The value to increase or decrease each time, can be a decimal

stringMode.description: Set value as string to support high precision decimals. Will set defaultValue,value, min, max, onChange to string type
stringMode.description_zh: Set value as string to support high precision decimals. Will set defaultValue,value, min, max, onChange to string type

events.name: onBlur
events.description: Triggered when the input lose focus
events.description_zh: Triggered when the input lose focus

events.name: onFocus
events.description: Triggered when the input get focus
events.description_zh: Triggered when the input get focus

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Let the input box lose focus
methods.description_zh: Let the input box lose focus

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Let the input box get focus
methods.description_zh: Let the input box get focus
